## Description and Rationale

A team of Flight Physic data analytics enthusiasts linked to a major aircraft manufacturer. We are seeking the challenge while wanting to learn on the problem presented.

## Details

* Type: Industry
* Country: Germany

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(gt)

gt(tibble::tribble(
  ~id, ~forename, ~surname,  ~affiliation,
   1L,   "Xyzzy",  "XYZZY", "Undisclosed"
  )
) |>   cols_label(id = md("**ID**"), forename = md("**Forename**"), surname ~ md("**Surname**"), affiliation ~ md("**Affiliation**"))
```
